0.0.1.text1:
Flobal Fintech Conf Devsprint 2019
Flobal Fintech Conf is a place for developers from across the country (and beyond) to get together and contribute to upstream projects under blockchain. Get your hands dirty writing some code. Hence, for all Open Source enthusiasts out there, the Blockchaincon.io team is happy to announce Dev Sprints @ Blockchaincon.io.

A sprint is a get-together of people involved in a project to further a focused development of the project. Sprints typically last from one week up to three weeks. Sprints have become popular events in some open-source projects.
0.0.1.text2:
Have you tried contributing to any Open Source project but lost because of not getting mentorship? Or Start contributing to any Open source project is still in your TODO list? If so, Dev sprint is the best place for you. During Dev sprint, Mentors/Contributors of Open source projects guides participants from generating development build to submit a patch for a bug. It is best opportunity to experience the culture of Open source. People from newbie to experienced together contribute to project. During the session if you are stuck you can solve your confusions instantly from the mentors. From past experience, we found dev sprint projects are not limited for conference days but participants are still active contributor from past year's Devsprint.

Any maintainer is Welcome to Add a project. There will be no shortlisting of projects. We are using the CFP platform to make it easier to manage and keep the projects at one place.

Dates
Monday, 8th Oct, 2018 - Tuesday, 9th Oct, 2018

Venue
DBS Office, Waverock, Nanakram Guda, Hyderabad
